title: The Mayonnaise Affair
description: Life was perfect for Ron Ramsey. But he wanted more. Dating the most beautiful woman in the world and living a life of well-earned luxury were not enough for Ron. With the help of Strawberry, a plus size prostitute in South Florida, Ron is able to carry out an act that is unplanned, inexpiable, unconventional, and yes with mayonnaise. The Mayonnaise Affair is a short story - Not for the prudish or those with a small appetite.
author: Frank Linn
